event.title: died in a Buenos Aires hospital, having been there since earlier in June

data.event: According to a report from the government's health ministry, she died in a Buenos Aires hospital, having been there since earlier in June.

event.title: Last week the World Health Organization announced

data.event: Last week the World Health Organization announced a declaration that Swine flu has reached the level of a pandemic.

event.title: attributed to the virus as of Monday

data.event: According to the WHO, excluding the deaths in Argentina there have been 163 deaths globally attributed to the virus as of Monday.
